docs.name: MaterialDialogComponent
docs.comment:
A styled container following the Material Spec for Dialogs.

Supported Content:

  • [header] -- Header content for the dialog.
  • [footer] -- Footer content for the dialog.

Attributes:

  • headered -- Adds a gray background to the dialog header.
  • info -- Styles the dialog as an info dialog.

inputs.name: error
inputs.comment: Error to show up in the error section of the dialog.

inputs.name: escapeHandler
inputs.comment: Function to handle escape key events from the dialog. By default it tries to close the parent modal, if any.

inputs.name: shouldListenForFullscreenChanges
inputs.comment: Determines whether to listen for when the dialog enters or exits fullscreen mode.

inputs.name: shouldShowScrollStrokes
inputs.comment:
Whether to show the top/bottom borders on the

part of the dialog to indicate whether there is more content that the user can reach by scrolling.

outputs.name: isInFullscreenMode
outputs.comment: Stream for when the dialog enters or exits fullscreen mode.
